title: Invincible Season 4 is coming March 2026!!!! #nycc #invincible #season4 #tv #trailer

author: IGN
description:
Prime Video debuted the fan favorite Burger Mart-inspired teaser trailer for Season Four of Invincible at the packed New York Comic Con panel with over 4,500 enthusiastic fans in attendance. Voice cast members Steven Yeun, Gillian Jacobs, and co-creator, executive producer, and co-showrunner Robert Kirkman revealed the highly anticipated teaser trailer, which announced the critically acclaimed adult-animated superhero series co-produced by Skybound Entertainment and Amazon MGM Studios, will return in March 2026. 

Fans in attendance were treated to an additional surprise announcement that Lee Pace (Foundation, Bodies Bodies Bodies) will join the voice cast of Invincible as Thragg, the long-awaited character making his series debut in Season Four. One of the comic’s most enduring and imposing villains, Thragg leads the Viltrum Empire as Grand Regent. Trained from birth for this role, Thragg rules his people through strength, cruelty, and will – determined to restore Viltrum to its prev
title: Invincible Season Four - Official Teaser Trailer (2026) Steven Yeun, Gillian Jacobs | NYCC 2025

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Nintendo Switch 2 GameShare Trailer for Plants vs. Zombies: Replanted, a remaster of the classic survival defense tower defense game developed by PopCap Games and The Lost Pixels. Players can play with a friend in co-op or PvP, courtesy of Nintendo Switch 2 GameShare, to take on the undead with new levels and more modern features. Plants vs. Zombies: Replanted is launching on Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Plants vs. Zombies: Replanted - Official Nintendo Switch 2 GameShare Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:

James Gunn recently admitted he wanted to add a Deadpool cameo in Peacemaker's Season 2 finale. Ryan Reynolds was apparently on board, but Gunn knew getting the okay from both Warner Bros. and Marvel/Disney would've been too big of a legal hurdle. Gunn has big plans for Peacemaker outside of his HBO show, with the DCU expanding next year with Supergirl, the Lanterns series, and the Clayface film. In other news, Warner Bros. has set a date for the Minecraft movie sequel. It's expected in July of 2027, and director Jared Hess is expected to return along with most of the cast. And finally, join the stars of the live-action How to Train Your Dragon as they explore the new Isle of Berk in Universal Epic Universe at Universal Orlando Resort.

Presented by Universal Orlando Resort and its new theme park, Universal Epic Universe.

#Peacemaker #IGN #DC
title: James Gunn Tried to Get a Major MCU Character Into Peacemaker - IGN The Fix: Entertainment

author: IGN
description: Watch the Accolades Trailer for Super Mario Galaxy + Super Mario Galaxy 2, a collection of two iconic 3D platformers remastered for modern hardware, developed by Nintendo. Explore the cosmos on a galactic-sized adventure with Mario and company with 4K resolution, 60 FPS, and mouse controls for Nintendo Switch 2. Super Mario Galaxy + Super Mario Galaxy 2 is available now for Nintendo Switch and Nintendo Switch 2.
title: Super Mario Galaxy + Super Mario Galaxy 2 - Official Accolades Trailer

description:
Check out the latest Legacy of Valor trailer for the upcoming medieval RPG that blends realistic medieval environments with a deep system of estate management, large-scale battles, and personal stories. In Legacy of Valor, take on the role of a noble in a fallen kingdom, rebuilding power and influence while facing moral choices that shape both individual fates and the future of the realm. A Kickstarter campaign for Legacy of Valor is available now.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Legacy of Valor - Official Kickstarter Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Magic: The Gathering x Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles trailer for this upcoming collaboration between the classic trading card game and the iconic TMNT heroes. The Magic: The Gathering x Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles trailer shows a peek into what you can expect from this collaboration ahead of the launch, including the commander deck, bundles, and more. Magic: The Gathering x Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles will be available everywhere on March 27, 2026.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Magic: The Gathering x Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Snoopy & The Great Mystery Club is available now on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X/S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store). Watch the Snoopy & The Great Mystery Club launch trailer for a mystery-filled adventure game starring everyone's favorite Beagle pup. Take flight in the Sopwith Camel against the Red Baron, dodge disaster at the Kite-Eating Tree, and more as you suit up as Detective Snoopy and solve cases with classic charm and clever style.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Snoopy & The Great Mystery Club - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Insomnia – Chapter One is a first-person narrative horror adventure inspired by Still Wakes the Deep, The Thing, and Amnesia. Set in the frozen isolation of an Arctic research station, the game blends psychological tension, environmental storytelling, and emotional survival without combat. The player steps into the role of Ethan Miller, a technician whose routine maintenance task spirals into a nightmare of paranoia and existential dread after a mysterious breach in the facility. Check out the demo now as part of Steam Next Fest:  https://store.steampowered.com/app/3939100/Insomnia_Chapter_One/

Music by: Neuromorph - https://www.youtube.com/@NeuromorphMusic

#IGN #Gaming
title: Insomnia – Chapter One: Official Demo Trailer (Steam Next Fest 2025)

author: IGN
description:
Ready to own the next frontier of FPS combat? Battlefield 6 is here, and we've got the intel you need. Check out 5 critical things you need to know, from the Kinesthetic Combat System and diverse classes to overhauled gunplay, strategic destruction, the new multiplayer modes, and the brand-new campaign.
Presented by Battlefield 6.

Check out this special page to learn about the game’s classes, weapons, and vehicles. www.ign.com/special/battlefield6
title: Battlefield 6: 5 Things You NEED to Know

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the 'Casting' Teaser Trailer for Wonder Man, the next action-adventure superhero installment in the MCU distributed by Marvel Studios. Wonder Man is streaming in January 2026 exclusively on Disney+.

Hollywood actor Simon Williams is thrust into the world of superheroes as he gets powers of his own, and becomes the new superhero Wonder Man.

Wonder Man stars Yahya Abdul-Mateen II, Ben Kingsley, Demetrius Grosse, Lauren Glazier, Byron Bowers, and more. The series was created by Destin Daniel Cretton.

Wonder Man is streaming in January 2026 exclusively on Disney+.

#WonderMan #MCU #IGN
title: Marvel Studios' Wonder Man - Official Teaser Trailer (2026) Yahya Abdul-Mateen II, Ben Kingsley

description: Who are these kids? What have they been through and why are they here? Tarsier Narrative Director Dave Mervik introduces us to REANIMAL and invites mystery horror fans to grab a loved one and go through hell together in couch co-op mode at Steam Next Fest starting Monday, October 13 at 6am PT. Wishlist Reanimal on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2129530/REANIMAL/
title: Reanimal: First 5 Minutes of Gameplay With Developer Commentary

description:
Don't miss the 'It All Goes Down on PS5' Trailer for Battlefield 6, the latest entry in the first-person action shooter franchise developed by DICE, Battlefield Studios, and EA. Players can experience the high-octane thrill only a Battlefield could provide with Battlefield 6 on PlayStation 5. Battlefield 6 is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#Battlefield6 #Gaming #IGN
title: Battlefield 6 - Official 'It All Goes Down on PS5' Trailer

author: IGN
description:
There are several dogtag collectibles hidden in every level of Battlefield 6. They’re needed to complete the Campaign challenges that earn you different rewards such as in-game cosmetics. Here’s all the locations, and you can jump to the timecode you need for your convenience!

Timecodes
0:00 - Always Faithful Dogtag 1
0:14 - Always Faithful Dogtag 2
0:32 - Always Faithful Dogtag 3
0:50 - The Rock Dogtag 1
1:02 - The Rock Dogtag 2
1:15 - The Rock Dogtag 3
1:34 - Operation Gladius Dogtag 1
1:51 - Operation Gladius Dogtag 2
2:02 - Operation Gladius Dogtag 3
2:16 - Night Raid Dogtag 1
2:30 - Night Raid Dogtag 2
2:44 - Night Raid Dogtag 3
3:02 - Night Raid Dogtag 4
3:18 - No Sleep Dogtag 1
3:28 - No Sleep Dogtag 2
3:47 - No Sleep Dogtag 3
3:59 - Moving Mountains Dogtag 1
4:11 - Moving Mountains Dogtag 2
4:25 - Moving Mountains Dogtag 3
4:42 - Moving Mountains Dogtag 4
5:06 - Nile Guard Dogtag 1
5:20 - Nile Guard Dogtag 2
5:36 - Operation Ember Strike Dogtag 1
6:00 - Operation Ember Strike
title: Battlefield 6 - All Campaign Dogtag Locations (With Timecodes)

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Pre-Order Trailer for Chicken Run: Eggstraction, a comedic action-adventure game developed by Aardman Animations Limited. 

Players will engage in stealth, chaos, and more alone or with friends in co-op in this progression from Dawn of the Nugget. Play new missions, overcome challenges, and more in Chicken Run: Eggstraction, coming soon to PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #ChickenRunEggstraction #ActionAdventure
title: Chicken Run: Eggstraction - Official Pre-Order Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the 'Hold My Hand' Launch Trailer for Little Nightmares 3, an atmospheric horror co-op adventure game developed by Supermassive Games. 

Players will embark on a journey between two best friends in search of an escape from Nowhere. Solve puzzles and survive a world full of frights in Little Nightmares 3, available now for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC.

#IGN #LittleNightmares3 #Horror
title: Little Nightmares 3 - Official 'Hold My Hand' Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the latest Fortnite Reload trailer to see what to expect with the new map, Nitemare Island.

Reload is getting a new map, Nitemare Island, featuring a “greatest hits” of POIs from Fortnitemares past. Drop in for a terrifying trip down memory lane, along with a new loot pool and ranked reset. Nitemare Island is available now in Fortnite Reload.

#IGN #Fortnite #FortniteReload
title: Fortnite Reload - Official Nitemare Island Trailer

author: IGN
description: Code Vein 2 producer Iizuka-san and game director Yoshimura-san break down the recent story trailer for the upcoming stylish soulslike sequel from Bandai Namco in this nine-minute deep-dive video. Code Vein 2 will be released for PC, PS5, and Xbox Series X|S on January 30, 2026.
title: Code Vein 2: Story Trailer Breakdown

author: IGN
description: Welcome back to Next-Gen Console Watch! This week Daemon, Max, and Ryan take a look at Microsoft's recent comments committing itself to another generation of gaming console hardware. The Xbox brand had a pretty rough week recently, when they announced a price hike on their Game Pass Ultimated service, on top of the already-announced hardware price hike. Fan response was, as expected, not great, with the Game Pass membership website reportedly crashing due to the number of people logging on to unsubscribe. Does another generation of Xbox hardware make sense for Microsoft? And how can they go about fixing the Game Pass service?
title: Why Xbox Can’t Give Up on Hardware - Next-Gen Console Watch
